welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nordwalde, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere of our historic town known for its beautiful countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Nordwalde has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Twente Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
